lines.text: How'd you like to pay for that? Cash, check, credit card?
Uh, well, we're a little short on money right now, sir, but I'll consider it an honor and a privilege to suck your dick.
And they say our world has lost its Finesse
I can't go back to who I was. I'm different now. I sing.
I'm gonna be the only major thing that has happened to you in your life, and you're gonna be jerking off to my memory on your goddamned death bed!
Sorry Candy, I'm going out for a pack of cigarettes.
My mother didn't believe in mayonnaise. She didn't believe in food that requires electricity.
I'm just a little tired of the American dream.
